---
title: "Letterboxd Cleaning"
format: html
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse) 
letterboxd_data |>
  head()

letterboxd_data |>
  mutate(rating_numerical = fct_recode(Rating, "★★★★★" = "5", "★★★★½" = "4.5", "★★★★" = "4", "★★★½" = "3.5", "★★★" = "3", "★★½" = "2.5", "★★" = "2", "★½" = "1.5", "★" = "1", "½" = "1/2"))
```
